statements: SELECT * FROM LoanApplications ORDER BY application_date DESC;
SELECT application_id, applicant_name FROM LoanApplications WHERE status='approved';
SELECT * FROM LoanApplications WHERE loan_amount > 5000;
SELECT applicant_name, loan_amount FROM LoanApplications ORDER BY loan_amount DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LoanApplications WHERE status='pending';
SELECT * FROM LoanApplications WHERE status = 'pending';
SELECT application_id, applicant_name, loan_amount, application_date FROM LoanApplications WHERE loan_amount > 10000 ORDER BY application_date DESC;
SELECT applicant_name, loan_amount FROM LoanApplications WHERE loan_amount BETWEEN 5000 AND 15000 AND status = 'approved' ORDER BY applicant_name ASC;
SELECT application_id, status FROM LoanApplications WHERE status IN ('approved', 'rejected') AND application_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY status DESC, application_date ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_applications, status FROM LoanApplications GROUP BY status HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY total_applications DESC;
SELECT * FROM LoanApplications;
SELECT application_id, applicant_name, loan_amount FROM LoanApplications WHERE status = 'Approved';
SELECT applicant_name, application_date, loan_amount FROM LoanApplications ORDER BY application_date DESC;
SELECT application_id, applicant_name, loan_amount FROM LoanApplications WHERE loan_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM ApprovalStatus ORDER BY approval_date;
SELECT * FROM LoanApplications WHERE loan_amount > 5000 ORDER BY application_date DESC;
SELECT applicant_name, loan_amount, application_date FROM LoanApplications WHERE status = 'Pending' ORDER BY applicant_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM LoanApplications WHERE loan_amount BETWEEN 2000 AND 10000 AND status = 'Approved';
SELECT applicant_name, loan_amount, application_date, status FROM LoanApplications WHERE status IN ('Rejected', 'Approved') ORDER BY application_date ASC, loan_amount DESC;

SELECT la.applicant_name, la.loan_amount, as.approval_decision FROM LoanApplications la JOIN ApprovalStatus as ON la.application_id = as.application_id WHERE as.approval_decision = 'Approved' ORDER BY la.application_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM LoanApplications;
SELECT applicant_name, loan_amount FROM LoanApplications WHERE loan_amount > 5000;
SELECT COUNT(application_id) AS total_applications FROM LoanApplications;
SELECT applicant_name, decision_reason FROM LoanApplications WHERE decision_date >= '2021-10-01';
SELECT application_id, applicant_name, loan_amount FROM LoanApplications ORDER BY loan_amount DESC;
SELECT applicant_name, loan_amount FROM LoanApplications WHERE application_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY loan_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM LoanApplications WHERE decision_date < '2022-01-01' AND loan_amount > 10000;
SELECT application_id, applicant_name, decision_date FROM LoanApplications WHERE decision_reason IS NOT NULL;
SELECT applicant_name, decision_date FROM LoanApplications WHERE application_status IN ('Approved', 'Rejected') ORDER BY decision_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM LoanApplications WHERE decision_reason LIKE '%documentation%';
SELECT * FROM LoanApplications
SELECT applicant_name, loan_amount FROM LoanApplications
SELECT * FROM LoanApplications WHERE approval_status = TRUE
SELECT application_id, applicant_name, loan_amount FROM LoanApplications ORDER BY loan_amount DESC
SELECT applicant_name, rejection_reason FROM LoanApplications WHERE rejection_reason IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM LoanApplications WHERE approval_status = TRUE ORDER BY application_date DESC;
SELECT applicant_name, loan_amount FROM LoanApplications WHERE loan_amount > 5000 ORDER BY loan_amount DESC, application_date ASC;
SELECT application_id, applicant_name, rejection_reason FROM LoanApplications WHERE rejection_reason IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM LoanApplications WHERE application_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY application_date ASC, loan_amount DESC;
SELECT application_id, applicant_name, loan_amount FROM LoanApplications WHERE loan_amount < 1000 AND approval_status = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM LoanApplications ORDER BY application_id;
SELECT applicant_name, loan_amount FROM LoanApplications WHERE application_status='approved';
SELECT application_id, decision FROM LoanApplications WHERE decision='rejected' ORDER BY decision_date DESC;
SELECT applicant_name, loan_amount, decision_date FROM LoanApplications WHERE decision='pending' ORDER BY applicant_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM LoanApplications WHERE loan_amount > 5000 ORDER BY loan_amount DESC, decision_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM LoanApplications WHERE application_id = 12345;
SELECT applicant_name, loan_amount FROM LoanApplications WHERE loan_amount > 5000;
SELECT application_id, applicant_name, loan_amount, application_status FROM LoanApplications WHERE decision = 'approved' ORDER BY loan_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM LoanApplications WHERE decision_date >= '2022-01-01' AND decision_date <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT applicant_name, loan_amount, application_status FROM LoanApplications WHERE application_status IN ('pending', 'rejected') ORDER BY application_status ASC, loan_amount DESC;
